title: Automation Can Solve Resource Overprovisioning in Kubernetes
author: Laurent Gil
description: Organizations can significantly reduce cloud waste and improve resource utilization with automation to address inefficiencies in Kubernetes environments.
cntitle: 自动化可以解决 Kubernetes 中的资源过度配置
cndescription: 通过自动化解决 Kubernetes 环境中的低效问题，组织可以显著减少云浪费并提高资源利用率。
